placeholders.HERO_HEADING_TEXT: Transform Your Images with Powerful Processing
placeholders.HERO_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Edit, enhance, and optimize your photos with our intuitive image processing tool. From basic adjustments to advanced filters, PixelPro has everything you need to create stunning visuals.
placeholders.FOOTER_TEXT: © 2023 PixelPro. Elevate your imagery with precision and creativity.
